content: three colors of berroco ultra® alpaca are used to create these fun fingerless mitts and you have an endless number of color combinations one size **finished measurements** approximately 8 around x 8 long **yarn** berroco ultra alpaca 100 grs 1 hank each #62100 eiderdown c1 #62168 candy floss mix c2 and #6292 tiger s eye mix c3 **needles and notions** 1 set each double-pointed needles dpns sizes 2 2 75 mm and 4 3 50 mm or size to obtain gauge 1 st marker waste yarn to hold sts for afterthought thumb tapestry needle **gauge** 24 sts and 26 row = 4 in stockinette st following chart on larger needles
